Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_nw48mp39tT1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="1080" data-orig-width="1920"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/4a684bab4b3c6f72a74a0c53579464ed/tumblr_inline_nw48n5LYTS1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="1080" data-orig-width="1920"/></figure><p>The <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136236">NASA Multimission Modular Space Exploration Vehicle (MMSEV)</a> Is a radical new concept that uses common components for ground rovers and in-space exploration craft. This modularity opens up the possibility of a variety of different configurations. The MSEV is the KSP equivalent from Wild Blue Industries. With the Buffalo, you can explore space in style! #KSP</p>
first! I love this mod so much! I've been playing with it for a few days now and I will be playing with it for the forseeable future. I hope to make a cinematic with it some time.
Woah same developer two weeks in a row. Congrats to Angel-125!

And this competes nicely with Roverdude's Karibu

Congrats

<figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="1080" data-orig-width="1920"></figure>The NASA Multimission Modular Space Exploration Vehicle (MMSEV) Is a radical new concept that uses common components for ground rovers and in-space exploration craft. This modularity opens up the possibility of a variety of different configurations. The MSEV is the KSP equivalent from Wild Blue Industries. With the Buffalo, you can explore space in style! #KSP

Thanks all The Buffalo is a small craft for ground, air and space exploration. I'm hoping to bring something I did in early 2014 into the game; I think it would fit (with appropriate changes)

This was also based on NASA's MMSEV.

Congratulations!! I've just got to know this MOD and downloaded it, looks really impressive. Also, I'm looking forward for the RABBIT, keep it up. Cheers, mate.

Thanks all The Buffalo is a small craft for ground, air and space exploration. I'm hoping to bring something I did in early 2014 into the game; I think it would fit (with appropriate changes)

http://www.spellflight.com/albums/ContactLostArt/RABBIT.jpg

This was also based on NASA's MMSEV.
